user_question: How can I make my urban garden more sustainable and generate an image of a sustainable urban garden?
final_answer: To make your urban garden more sustainable: 1) Use rainwater harvesting systems. 2) Implement composting for organic waste. 3) Choose native plants. 4) Use vertical gardening techniques. Image of a sustainable urban garden generated. Native plants for NYC: Eastern Redbud, Butterfly Weed, Wild Bergamot.
